channel.title: Help server on Linux
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server at gnu.java.lang.MainThread.run(libgcj.so.90) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server not found in gnu.gcj.runtime.SystemClassLoader{urls=[file:./], parent=gnu.gcj.runtime.ExtensionClassLoader{urls=[], parent=null}} at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.90) at gnu.gcj.runtime.SystemClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.90) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.90) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.90) at gnu.java.lang.MainThread.run(libgcj.so.90) [/code]
I get this then i want to turn on my server. Can somebody help me? Im on Linux Debian 5.0 (32Bit) Server: 474
My run.sh:
[code]#!/bin/sh java -cp bin.rs2.server.server java server & read[/code]

server class cannot be found broski due to main() calling it and it not being found initiates an error.

item.description:
@alduras wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server at gnu.java.lang.MainThread.run(libgcj.so.90) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server not found in gnu.gcj.runtime.SystemClassLoader{urls=[file:./], parent=gnu.gcj.runtime.ExtensionClassLoader{urls=[], parent=null}} at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.90) at gnu.gcj.runtime.SystemClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.90) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.90) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.90) at gnu.java.lang.MainThread.run(libgcj.so.90)

I get this then i want to turn on my server. Can somebody help me? Im on Linux Debian 5.0 (32Bit)
